description: Licensed medical doctor or healthcare provider treating patients
Licensed nurse providing patient care and treatment
Clerical and administrative support staff handling patient information
column7: Annual HIPAA privacy and security training

description: Information technology professionals maintaining systems and networks
Personnel processing insurance claims and patient billing
obligations: Keep billing information confidential, use only for billing purpose, protect financial PHI
training_required: Annual billing compliance and privacy training

description: Employees managing medical records and health information
obligations: Control access to records, maintain records integrity, ensure confidentiality
training_required: Annual records management and HIPAA training

description: Individual responsible for security and privacy compliance
obligations: Monitor compliance, investigate incidents, implement corrective actions, maintain documentation
Follow covered entity policies, maintain confidentiality, report breaches
training_required: Initial HIPAA orientation and annual refresher

description: Educational and training participants observing or assisting in healthcare
obligations: Maintain confidentiality, follow access restrictions, understand HIPAA regulations
Follow all security policies, maintain access logs, report unusual activities
